attributes.long_description:
World Confederation of Businesses (WORLDCOB) is an international business association founded in 2004 and based in Houston, Texas. The primary mission of WORLDCOB is to promote business development worldwide, recognizing and boosting the growth of leading businesses and businesspeople in every country through the special tools and services that we offer our members. Today, WORLDCOB has over 3,500 proud members, representing more than 130 countries across the globe. In an effort to offer greater benefits and to continue promoting the business development of our organisation‚Äôs members, WORLDCOB provides a series of services to business people worldwide through our brands.

These include THE BIZZ, an international awards program that offers recognition of business excellence; WORLDCOB-CSR: accredited certification of corporate social responsibility; EXPOBIZZ: a business convention aimed at fostering international commerce; BIZZNEWS: regular news on business trends from around the world; and BIZZTRAINING: our business training and development services.

attributes.name: EMURGO
attributes.description: Emurgo develops, supports, and incubates commercial ventures who want to revolutionize their industries using the blockchain technology.
attributes.long_description:
Cardano is a 3rd generation blockchain platform with more advanced features than any protocol yet developed, and the first one to evolve out of a scientific philosophy, where feature development is driven by scientific peer reviewed white papers. Papers: https://iohk.io/research/papers/ Team: https://iohk.io/team/. More info about Cardano and what it is trying to build:
https://youtu.be/Ja9D0kpksxw Talk about Cardano (Espa√±ol) https://youtu.be/Ygknj7tE40o

Cardano is not a company but a group of three organizations: IOHK, EMURGO and Cardano Foundation that work closely together.

#EMURGO drives the adoption of #Cardano & adds value to #ADA holders. We build, invest in & advise projects that adopt Cardano blockchain.

EMURGO has its headquarters in Tokyo, Japan. But we also have presence in: New York, USA through our acceleration program dLab https://dlab.vc, India through our educational program to train over 2500+ developers, Indonesia, Singapore, among others. The R&D team is mostly a distributed team with devs in: USA, Canada, Japan, Russia, Slokavia, Ukraine and Spain. More info about EMURGO in our webpage and in our Youtube channel.

We are looking for an Engineer or a developer with really strong CS skills to support the R&D department. Some of the main responsibilities will be:

- Support development of new products
- Maintenance of current projects
- Learning! (really important and we are happy to teach). Programming skills: Javascript (flow / typescript), Rust, Haskell and smart contract languages (like K-Framework and Plutus). Concepts: Blockchain, Finance, etc.
- Support some of our Investments and Startups (https://dlab.vc).
- Conferences across the world. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3OTDIkVn3mI
- Content creation (blogs, videos, etc)

We are really proud of our technical capabilities and our welcoming culture. We also embrace open source and you can find most of our work open sourced:

Yoroi Chrome Extension (Light Wallet) https://github.com/Emurgo/yoroi-frontend
Yoroi Mobile (iOS and Android) https://github.com/Emurgo/yoroi-mobile
Icarus Importer (Full Node in Haskell) https://github.com/Emurgo/project-icarus-importer

Yoroi is a light wallet for Cardano. It's secure, fast and simple. All the cryptography was coded in Rust and compiled to WebAssembly, where it's used by Javascript with Flow. Please feel free to ask us any questions :)
attributes.projects:
EMURGO is a global blockchain technology company providing solutions for developers, startups, enterprises, and governments. EMURGO develops enterprise-grade applications, builds developer tools, invests in startups, and provides blockchain education. EMURGO has offices and manages projects in Singapore, Japan, the USA, India, and Indonesia. 
EMURGO is also one of the founding entities behind Cardano blockchain, a globally recognized top ten blockchain platform. Cardano is differentiated from other blockchains for its scientific philosophy and peer-reviewed research to solve industry issues in scalability, interoperability, sustainability, proof-of-stake, and smart contract security. EMURGO is a founding entity of Cardano and supports the Cardano ecosystem through:
  • Creation of technical proposals for systems upgrades
  • Hardware wallets integrations
  • Provision of technical support to third party companies
  • Onboarding of enterprises and organizations to increase ADA liquidity

Payment above the average of the South American market. We are not looking for "good price", but skills and responsibility. We know that in South America, there is super good talent and that is why we are expanding our search in South America specially in Chile.

attributes.name: Cultivo
attributes.description: Cultivo is the new way to invest in natural climate solutions at scale. Our mission is to unlock investment at scale to restore nature and generate ecosystem services.
attributes.long_description:
Cultivo unlocks investment in nature at scale.

We are a public benefit company, and our purpose is to help nature, help us.

By unlocking investment into nature based solutions our hope is that we can help nature by protecting biodiversity, restoring degraded land, rewilding, planting new trees, and stopping forests from being cut down.

In return, nature can help us by protecting our food systems, preventing flooding, preventing natural disasters and pandemics, creating jobs, improving society, providing us with cleaner air and water, and capturing carbon to help stop our planet from overheating.

We believe that the key to unlocking investment in natural capital at scale is to attract private investment, and prove to those private investors that they can get a strong financial return, as well as a positive natural and social return.
attributes.projects: Cultivo is the new way to invest in natural climate solutions at scale. Our mission is to unlock investment to restore nature and generate ecosystem services. Using our platform we aim to enable carbon capture, biodiversity protection, water capture and to provide local community support. Our team, together with landowners, NGOs and investors works in harmony with nature with the aim of capturing over 1 billion tons of CO2 in the next 20 years.

attributes.name: Qventus
attributes.description:
Qventus‚Äô mission is to simplify how healthcare operates so it just works ‚Äî for everyone. 

The company offers an AI-based software platform that helps hospital teams make better operational decisions in real-time.
attributes.long_description:
The Company

Have you ever found yourself or a loved one waiting hours and hours in a hospital Emergency Room to get care? Or have you ever had a surgery scheduled for months in the future that needed to happen sooner? Unfortunately, our healthcare system is full of these types of operational problems. Our work saves lives and helps hospitals cut tens of millions of dollars in operational costs, while improving the quality of care they‚Äôre able to deliver.

Qventus is a real-time decision making platform for hospital operations. Our mission is to simplify how healthcare operates, so that hospitals and caregivers can focus on delivering the best possible care to patients. We use artificial intelligence and machine learning to create products that help nurses, doctors, and hospital staff anticipate issues and make operational decisions proactively.

Qventus works with leading public, academic and community hospitals across the United States. The company was recognized by the 2019 Black Book Awards in healthcare for patient flow and by CB Insights as a 2019 top 100 Most Promising Company in Artificial Intelligence. Recently, Qventus won the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation Emergency Response for the Healthcare System Innovation Challenge through its work helping health systems across the country plan for and operate in the COVID pandemic.
attributes.projects:
Qventus provides a real-time decision-making platform for hospital operations. Our mission is to simplify how healthcare operates, so that hospitals and caregivers can focus on delivering the best possible care to patients. We use artificial intelligence and machine learning to create products and solutions that help nurses, doctors, and hospital staff anticipate issues and make operational decisions proactively. 

Qventus works with leading public, academic and community hospitals across the United States. The company was recognized by the 2019 Black Book Awards in healthcare for patient flow and by CB Insights as a 2019 top 100 Most Promising Company in Artificial Intelligence. Recently, Qventus won the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation Emergency Response for the Healthcare System Innovation Challenge through its work helping health systems across the country plan for and operate in the COVID pandemic.

Values
We have been creating the internet of things (IoT) for over 20 years now and we want our products and solutions to be used globally and to become indispensible in any business.
Our team of professionals is the key to our success. This is why our efforts to help our employees are our primary priority: we want to meet our employees‚Äô expectations, take into account their wishes, provide them with opportunities, and ensure a friendly working environment, understanding, peer help, learning opportunities, ongoing improvement and personal well-being.
We are eager to understand and cherish every customer, which we can and must help to create the maximum value possible and to avail of all the opportunities offered by the internet of things (IoT) in the customer‚Äôs business.
And, what is most important: we want to work together and be able to promote and share good things with people who need our help most.

attributes.long_description: TeselaGen is an enterprise software company headquartered in San Francisco, California. At TeselaGen, we are building the information technology backbone for genetic engineering. Our mission is to provide a secure, scalable enterprise platform for modern molecular biology approaches to the production of the next generation of medicines, enzymes and agricultural products. Our customers range from large Fortune 50 companies to individual academic researchers.
attributes.projects: Biotechnology is reinventing the future of everything: fuels, fabrics, pharmaceuticals, food, almost every sector of the economy will be touched by it. At TeselaGen we are building an artificial intelligence-enabled operating system for biotechnology. Our platform bridges the gap between biologists who are designing valuable products ‚Äì like vaccines, biologic medicines, and sustainably sourced chemicals ‚Äì lab technicians who are running and optimizing experimental workflows, and bioinformaticians who analyze experimental data and have to recommend new experiments. This modern approach coupled with machine learning has opened the door for a radical transformation of biology and a rapid expansion of potential applications. TeselaGen was founded by a team of Stanford, Harvard and U. of California graduates and has raised funding from governments and private investors.

attributes.name: Get on Board
attributes.description:
This is us! 
We are set to shape and transform the digital job market in Latin America, giving startups and tech innovators the spotlight they deserve and helping talented digital professionals find better, more fulfilling workplaces.
attributes.long_description:
Get on Board is the biggest tech recruitment platform in Latin-America, with 600,000+ job applications sent. It offers modern tools for recruiters and a simple, curated experience for job seekers.

Thousands of startups and enterprises from Latin-America and the US trust Get on Board‚Äôs integrated platform and exclusive data on candidate performance to speed up their remote recruiting and lower dramatically their sourcing costs.

Meet the Gobers

We are a small, distributed team working remotely from Chile, Peru, Spain, Mexico, Argentina, and the USA. We are not defined by degrees or titles, as we come from different areas of knowledge, such as art, design, music, pedagogy, journalism, psychology among others.
We don't believe in hierarchies, and we all work together hand-by-hand towards the same goal: to promote awesome jobs for awesome people. That's our ethos.

Our Culture: Public by default

As we work remotely, we trust each other in making every piece of information available to the team, avoiding the 'bus factor' and ensuring transparency at all times. That's why everything is public by default, so nobody becomes a bottleneck in our daily tasks.

attributes.name: Heartlytics
attributes.description: Heartlytics es una plataforma que mejora la comunicaci√≥n entre el paciente en domicilio y el m√©dico tratante.
attributes.long_description: En Heartlytics tenemos la oportunidad de solucionar un problema fundamental: La mala y casi inexistente comunicaci√≥n que existe entre los m√©dicos y los pacientes de enfermedades cr√≥nicas que se encuentran en el domicilio. Hoy en d√≠a, en el sector p√∫blico, muchos de los pacientes con enfermedades cr√≥nicas respiratorias o card√≠acas, cancer y diabetes est√°n tratando su enfermedad en el domicilio. attributes.long_description: LastFood es una startup que rescata y comercializa alimentos y platos de comida no vendidos de restaurantes, plazas de mercado y panader√≠as en buenas condiciones y a bajos precios usando tecnolog√≠a.
attributes.projects:
What is LastFood
LastFood is a startup that rescues and markets unsold food and food dishes from restaurants, marketplaces, and bakeries in good condition and at low prices using technology.
Our Story
"In the year 99' my parents had a typical food restaurant, everything was going well until one day because of drug trafficking in Colombia during the 90's they lost it. Since then I had always wanted to have a restaurant like theirs, after working for 5 years in technology, in 2018 I created my own restaurant; the months passed and I was learning more and more how one worked, I began to realize how much food waste my restaurant had and those of the people I knew who also had one, that's when I started researching about food waste. It wasn't until October 2020, with the idea already in mind for two years and seeing what was happening with the pandemic, that I decided to start creating the first version of LastFood."
Miguel Rengifo
Founder & CEO

attributes.name: uBiome
attributes.description: Our mission is to use big data to understand the human microbiome by giving users the power to learn about their bodies, perform experiments, and see how current research studies apply to them.
attributes.long_description: As the world‚Äôs leading microbial genomics company, uBiome uses next generation high-throughput DNA sequencing technology to generate detailed analyses of the human microbiome, the ecosystem of trillions of bacteria which populate the human body, both in and on it. While most of an individual‚Äôs bacteria is found in the gut, there are dozens of other bacteria-harboring sites on the body, most with their own distinct microbial profiles. Individuals can have their own microbiomes tested by uBiome by providing a straightforward self-swabbed sample, returned by mail. Analysis is currently provided for five sites ‚Äì gut, oral, nose, genitals, and skin. uBiome was launched in 2012 by scientists and technologists educated at Stanford and UCSF after a crowdfunding campaign raised over $350,000 from citizen scientists, around triple its initial goal. The company is now funded by Andreessen Horowitz, Y Combinator, and other leading investors.

Entre el a√±o 2010 y 2013 reconocidas marcas internacionales se incorporaron a la gran lista que compone a Equity: ‚Äã Berghaus, Warrior, Technogym y SKLZ. Desde sus inicios, la cultura corporativa de Sparta se ha orientado a fomentar la vida sana y pr√°ctica deportiva, tanto en su cliente final como en sus colaboradores internos.
